statements: SELECT * FROM logs_and_audit_trails;
SELECT id, log_description FROM logs_and_audit_trails ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, log_description FROM logs_and_audit_trails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT log_description, log_timestamp FROM logs_and_audit_trails WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM logs_and_audit_trails WHERE log_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT id, log_description, log_timestamp FROM logs_and_audit_trails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM logs_and_audit_trails WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_description FROM logs_and_audit_trails WHERE log_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, log_description FROM logs_and_audit_trails WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT(log_description) FROM logs_and_audit_trails WHERE log_timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs_table;
SELECT id, log_message FROM logs_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, log_message FROM logs_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_message FROM logs_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_taken FROM audit_trails_table ORDER BY trail_id ASC;
SELECT id, log_message, timestamp FROM logs_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT log_message, id, timestamp FROM logs_table WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, action_taken, timestamp FROM audit_trails_table WHERE trail_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT trail_id, action_taken, user_id FROM audit_trails_table WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT id, log_message, timestamp FROM logs_table WHERE id = 1
SELECT log_message, timestamp, id FROM logs_table WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM audit_trails_table WHERE action = 'Login'
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action FROM audit_trails_table WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT metric_name, value FROM monitoring_table WHERE value > 100
SELECT * FROM logs_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM logs_table WHERE id > 100
SELECT trail_id, action FROM audit_trails_table WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM monitoring_table WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT metric_name, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM monitoring_table GROUP BY metric_name HAVING max_value > 500
SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT log_message FROM logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin'
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS num_events FROM audit_trails GROUP BY event_type
SELECT * FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.role_id
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE event_type = 'LOGIN' AND user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT role_name, permissions FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'READ%'
SELECT log_message FROM logs WHERE log_level = 'WARNING' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT platform_name, region FROM platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM events WHERE event_type = 'error' LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_content, log_timestamp FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_content, log_timestamp FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT platform_name, region FROM platforms WHERE platform_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT trail_id, activity, timestamp FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
